messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:  2285 - Frank Smith ?
messages.msgSnippet: ... She does that many times every day. ... You ve described it very well in your many posts on politics. Tia What you think of me is none of my business.
messages.messageBody:
>
>
>Tell us more about your "real, honest world," Sandra, please.

She does that many times every day.

>And while you're trying to put me down, please also describe, for our
>listeners, the "politically charged fringe world" you think I live in.

Tia

What you think of me is none of my business.

Tia Leschke leschke@...
On Vancouver Island

messages.subject: Re:  2285 - Frank Smith ?
messages.msgSnippet: on 8/25/02 2:45 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... Tell us more about your real, honest world, Sandra, please. And while you re trying to put me
messages.messageBody:
on 8/25/02 2:45 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> I think balance and non-duality are important things for unschoolers to have
> if they want their children to live in the real, honest world instead of in a
> politically charged fringe world.
>
> Sandra

Tell us more about your "real, honest world," Sandra, please.
And while you're trying to put me down, please also describe, for our
listeners, the "politically charged fringe world" you think I live in.

Ned Vare
